entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 07:30 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: SW 20 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
